title: What's the point in buying Statikk over PD?
body:
The only reason I can see is just a bit of burst from the passive and better wave clear.

But that doesn't even seem hugely noticeable unless your champion just sucks at clearing waves like Vayne.

Still, from PD you have better everything on just stats, besides movement speed, yet just one more 1% isn't even that noticeable.

I mean Statikk is better on certain champions than PD like Yasuo but on ADCs I feel like being able to move around freely with PD's passive along with everything else is just better, unless you're really behind and desperate to farm by clearing waves.
